description: This file defines the main React component for a Kanban board application, including context setup, filtering logic, drag-and-drop column reordering, and UI rendering.

classes.name: DraggableKanbanColumn
classes.description: A React component that makes a column draggable and droppable within the Kanban board, handling accessibility and drag-and-drop interactions.

methods.name: filterCardsAND
methods.description: Filters an array of card objects based on multiple criteria such as assignees, priorities, statuses, columns, and due date range, combining filters with AND logic.

methods.name: useFeedback
methods.description: Custom hook to access the FeedbackContext for showing toast notifications.

methods.name: moveColumn
methods.description: Reorders columns in the Kanban board and triggers a re-render and backend sync.
